data.title: Hanoi Tower Solution
data.solution:
n= int(input())
fr=0;to=2;sp=1
matched=[n,0,0]
tow=[[i for i in range(1, n+2)],[n+1],[n+1]]
while True:
    target=None
    if tow[fr][0]>=tow[to][0] and tow[fr][0]>=tow[sp][0]:fr,sp=sp,fr
    if tow[fr][0]<tow[to][0]:
        if tow[fr][0]<tow[sp][0]:
            for i in range(len(tow)):
                if i!=fr:
                    fr_base=tow[fr][matched[fr]-1]
                    if fr_base+1==tow[i][0]:target=i
            if target!=None:to=target
            sp=[i for i in range(3) if i!=fr and i!=to][0]
            if matched[fr]%2==0:to,sp=sp,to
    else:to,sp=sp,to;target=None
    tow[to]= [tow[fr][0]]+tow[to]
    tow[fr].pop(0)
    for i in range(len(tow)):
        count= int(len(tow[i])>1)
        for j in range(len(tow[i])-1):
            if tow[i][j]+1==tow[i][j+1] and j<len(tow[i])-2:count+=1
            else:break
        matched[i]=count
    print(f"{chr(65+fr)}--->{chr(65+to)}")
    if len(tow[2])==n+1:break
data.statement:
<<Game:>> Tower of Hanoi is a famous game in which there are three towers namely {{A}}, {{B}} and {{C}}. {{A}} consists of [[n]] disks of decreasing length from below to top, and {{B}} and {{C}} are empty initially. The game wants you to move all the disks from tower {{A}} to tower {{C}}, with {{B}} serving as a helping spare tower.

<<Rules:>> You can only put one topmost disk from a tower on a larger topmost disk in another tower or in an empty tower and not a larger disk on smaller one, in each step.

<<Hint:>> The minimum number of steps to win the game is (2^[[n]])-1

<<Task:>> Your task is to print all the steps involved in winning the game with minimum steps so that you can win it the next time you play (using your code), in the form: {{A}}--->{{B}} if the step involves moving the topmost disk from tower {{A}} to tower {{B}}

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Game: Tower of Hanoi is a famous game in which there are three towers namely A, B and C. A consists of n disks of decreasing length from below to top, and B and C are empty initially. The game wants you to move all the disks from tower A to tower C, with B serving as a helping spare tower.

Rules: You can only put one topmost disk from a tower on a larger topmost disk in another tower or in an empty tower and not a larger disk on smaller one, in each step.

Hint: The minimum number of steps to win the game is (2^n)-1

Task: Your task is to print all the steps involved in winning the game with minimum steps so that you can win it the next time you play (using your code), in the form: A--->B if the step involves moving the topmost disk from tower A to tower B
Input
Line 1: The number of disks n
Output
All the steps involved as shown in the below example for winning Tower of Hanoi with n disks.
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 7
Example
Input
2
Output
A--->B
A--->C
B--->C
